Text:
I have found that this *.pdf file
is image based, and it is 
Not possible for me 
to extract text from this eBook
using Adobe Reader X (10).

Therefore, I would recommend instead
the exact eBook at ..

==================

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6124664

"Drupal 7 Create and Operate 
any Type of Website Quickly and Effi "

====================



That *.pdf version from that 
ThePirateBzy.org page is text based
and it allows me to 'copy' text 
out of its pages.

The page I recommended above 
has disappeared;
but I have found another page 
here at ThePirateBay .org 
with a copy of this eBook
that unlike the eBook from this page
is an eBook from which 
I can extract text from
as opposed to the eBook from this page
that is just images of text pages.

The new page I found with the 
text-based version of this eBook 
is at ThePirateBay .org at..

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6153948
